data.decision: SuperAGI MCP serves as the action/execution layer in the Duro system. It provides: web_search, read_webpage, execute_python, workspace file operations, task management, shell_execute, and github_api. This complements Duro's memory layer - SuperAGI acts, Duro remembers.
data.rationale: Understanding the architectural separation: SuperAGI MCP = tools/actions, Duro = memory/knowledge. This clarifies how improvements should be targeted - action capabilities via SuperAGI toolkits, persistence via Duro artifacts.
data.context: Research on SuperAGI architecture and MCP implementation
